idea: There are billions of food recipes scattered over the internet, be it on Blogs/YouTube descriptions/Tumblr/Instagram/Twitter/Facebook, etc. It is a headache to note each recipe that you like, as these are all over the internet in different formats. So either you have to download a pdf, or it's in an email or take multiple screen shorts. I want to create a a universal format, one single place where all these recipes can be kept as an offline file, a recipe card for everyone, be it any recipe across the globe. "RECI PRO" will be one format, one place for all recipes under one roof, within one app. So a content creator will get a QR code/ link from which that recipe can be downloaded by an user.
name: Reci pro

idea:
1) Overview: 


In the past people planned airline tickets from airline websites but now aggregators offer a common platform of flight information for efficient planning. 


Similarly, the eco-tourism sites in India are promoting themselves individually inefficiently. People are unable to find reliable information for planning. 


We aim to create a digital platform to aggregate Rural eco-tourism facilities in India. Physical platforms (Kiosks) can be added as support to digital platform to counter digital illiteracy.
name: 3Stones Willage

idea:
Interack is a Location-Based Social networking app, which will help it's users to find people nearby and also see their linked social media IDs like their  Instagram/Snapchat IDs. Also Interack has a location based explore feed that enables users to see posts according to their current location. 

visit our website for more details : https://interackapp.com/
name: Interack
